project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would include: basic infrastructure at Nusa Dua for development of tourism estate accommodating about 2,500 hotel rooms; construction of estate access road, Denpasar by-pass road and eleven roads north of Denpasar; a hotel training school; a demonstration farm; and technical assistance to the BTDC, BTDB and the provincial agriculture department.
